alert.note: Alert for Estancia Valley; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:29PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN TORRANCE COUNTY THROUGH 600 PM MDT... At 529 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Tajique, or 7 miles west of Estancia, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Estancia and McIntosh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Estancia Valley; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood
